channel.title: Specifying box for color finding
channel.description: In the function FindColor(x,y,color,xs,ys,xe,ye), xs is one number,ys is one number,xe is one number, and ye is one number, but how can you specify a point with one number?

item.title: Specifying box for color finding
item.dc:creator: @Monkmonk693 Monkmonk693
item.description:
@Monkmonk693 wrote:

Oh thnx so much i just thought by box it meant to specify 4 points, not just 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Specifying box for color finding
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

Itâ€™s coordinate based. The first two sets of coords, xs,ys are the upper left hand corner of an imaginary box. The last two coords, xe,ye, are the lower right hand corner of the imaginary box. You get the coords by picking coordinates using the color picker.

Read full topic
